metadata.name: Enola Gay #1
metadata.description:
"What is hidden is the present about the past, and continuity is our time," depicts the history of the past, which is hidden by the passage of time, and the shape of autonomous life living in it. Kwon Soon-wang's world of works considers not only thinking, such as painting, engraving, photography, video, digital image, and installation art, but also work as a different visual language system from a Pluralism perspective, and frees communication between various media and genres. 

#NFTart  #Enola Gay   #memory   #war  #physical-based
